GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v6.1.13
GSD.description:
net: openvswitch: fix possible memory leak in ovs_meter_cmd_set()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit e336a9e08618203a456fb5367f1387b14554f55e, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c7c4c44c9a95d87e50ced38f7480e779cb472174. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: openvswitch: fix possible memory leak in ovs_meter_cmd_set()
